column3: People will surely want the font to be in Tahoma font on Windows...?\n

Automatic sanity-testing: PASSED, see http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/p4466_ad87bc4de10d8ff9934635f2a30078ccf531a124/ for binaries and test log.\nThis test script verifies pulls every time they are updated. It, however, dies sometimes and fails to test properly.  If you are waiting on a test, please check timestamps to verify that the test.log is moving at http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-te

The drawback of this is that on dark themes, the unit indicator is hard to read.

![mbtc](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/126646/3637195/fd89eecc-0ff9-11e4-8375-6e1b595741f7.png)

A low-prio improvement would be to make sure that the images are readable both on dark and light backgrounds (for example by adding a contour).
